itunes:title: Stung By A Bullet Ant (Danny Berk)
title: Stung By A Bullet Ant (Danny Berk)
itunes:author: Joe Vulpis & Ilya Feddy
itunes:summary: Our buddy Danny Berk comes by to talk about his ventures to South America where he saught to be bit by the most venomous insects. He was bitten and stung by the bullet ant, executioner wasp, and more. TW: We also talk about other dangerous stunts he has done which landed him in the hospital. Check out Danny on IG here: https://www.instagram.com/danny_berk/ Follow us on IG here: https://www.instagram.com/lightweightspod/ --- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/lightweights/support Advertising Inquiries: https://redcircle.com/brands Privacy & Opt-Out: https://redcircle.com/privacy
description:
Our buddy Danny Berk comes by to talk about his ventures to South America where he saught to be bit by the most venomous insects. He was bitten and stung by the bullet ant, executioner wasp, and more. TW: We also talk about other dangerous stunts he has done which landed him in the hospital.
